channel.title: QUESTION about making spells only for admins or mods
channel.description: How do i make a spell for only admins or mods? Like make fire blast or something

item.title: QUESTION about making spells only for admins or mods
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Goto the spell you want to make admin/mod.For fire blast you would search

fire blast (You need to search it twice,as one is for on npc and on player)
For an example,i will show you my fireblast code.

if (magicID == 1181) { // Fire blast if(playerLevel[6] >= 59) { ProjectileSpell(129, 130, 131, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, npcIndex, EnemyY2, EnemyX2, 59); hitDiff = misc.random(27); //Damage } else { sendMessage("You need a magic lvl of 59 for this spell !"); } }

That is my fire blast code,this is what you will need to change it to:

if (spellID == 1181) && playerRights >= 2) { // Fire blast if(playerLevel[6] >= 59) { ProjectileSpellPlayer(129, 130, 131, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 59); hitDiff = misc.random(15); } else { sendMessage("You need a magic lvl of 59 for this spell !"); } }

I don’t think i explained that as good as i could,but…I tried,if you have msn i can do it for you.

Read full topic
item.source: QUESTION about making spells only for admins or mods
